title: Leo Grey Nylon Pasta Spoon
description: A traditional spaghetti bolognese, a creamy spinach tagliatelle or a delicious prawn linguine, it all starts with the right tool to handle your pasta. This serving tool certainly doesnt sacrifice function for form. The Leo pasta spoon helps you to measure a good serving size of pasta and easily lifts out the cooked noodles without scratching your pans delicate non-stick coating.Safe to use with non-stick cookwareMade of heat resistant siliconeHanging loop for easy storageDDishwasher safe
